Headline: #3 King Drive & #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Adams
ShortDescription: Northbound #3 King Drive & #4 Cottage Grove buses are temp rerouted via Michigan, Adams, Dearborn, Wacker & Michigan, due to street blockage near Michigan/Adams

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #3 King Drive & #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Adams, Dearborn, Wacker & Michigan, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Michigan/Adams.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland and #X9 Ashland Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Ashland/50th
ShortDescription: Southbound #9 Ashland and #x9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 47th, Damen, 51st and Ashland: due to, street blockage near Ashland/50th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #9 Ashland and #X9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 47th, Damen, 51st, Ashland and over regular route, due to street blockage near Ashland/50th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: O'Hare bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to a sick customer.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Shuttle buses are requested from O'Hare to Jefferson Park to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Argyle
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Argyle due to sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing at Argyle due to sick customer. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
